messages.subject: To Lisa Bugg....I think your here...
messages.msgSnippet: Just wanted to tell you Lisa that your article in Home Ed magazine was wonderful!!!  I loved it!! I strategically placed it open in the potty room (the only
messages.messageBody:
Just wanted to tell you Lisa that your article in Home Ed magazine was
wonderful!!! I loved it!!
I strategically placed it open in the potty room (the only place my
husband will sit and read something like that) :)
Thanks for it!!
Ann
